column4: how do I configure dapper drake to use my wide aspect LCD monitor?
it should auto detect a wide screen when you first install, did u just replace a regular monitor with ur widescreen one?
I installed with the wide aspect monitor connected.  It did not autodetect.
wierd i have a laptop and ubuntu 5.10 and 6.06 both auto detected a wide screen.. have u looked int your /etc/X11/xorg.conf file for your resolution settings?
It detected as a "Generic Monitor".  All I get is 1024x768, 800x600, and 640x480
and thats probly gonna have to change.. id try chaning the resolution to something that the monitor is capable of
